description: This file defines an asynchronous service function 'list_resources' that retrieves a paginated and optionally filtered list of Resource ORM objects from a database using SQLAlchemy. It handles filters for provider, region, and state, constructs corresponding SQL queries, executes them asynchronously, and returns the list of resources along with the total count.

methods.name: Tuple[List[Resource],int] list_resources( session: AsyncSession, *, provider: Optional[str] = None, region: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None, page: int = 1, size: int = 20, )
methods.description: Asynchronously lists resources with optional filtering and pagination, returning a tuple of Resource objects and total count.

ctags.name: list_resources
ctags.signature: ( session: AsyncSession, *, provider: Optional[str] = None, region: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None, page: int = 1, size: int = 20, )
